list_definition.definition: the warmth from something which is hot

list_definition.definition: in a sports competition etc, one of two or more contests from which the winners go on to take part in later stages of the competition

list_definition.definition: (sometimes with up) to make or become hot or warm

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The day heats up quickly once the sun has risen.
